title: S17 Ep13: TCT: Stealing Your Life and Getting Away With It w/ William Francavilla
itunes:title: TCT: Stealing Your Life and Getting Away With It w/ William Francavilla
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents: Stealing Your Life and Getting Away With It with William Francavilla!

As we advance in technology, criminals become smarter and take advantage of that technology to figure out how to separate us from our personal information, our identity, and our money.  Each year Americans lose billions of dollars to fraudulent activity.

Certified Financial Planner/Author William Francavilla joins True Crime Tuesday to tell us about the different types of scams that are out there and how to avoid them from hitting you from your email, social media accounts, and most importantly, your bank account!

Get Bill's book here:  https://amzn.to/3AOappA
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
